Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Rosecrest Street, heading in an east to west direction.
Room.LongDescription: To the north of Rosecrest Street is a rowdy-looking bar and grill called the Golden Dragon Cantina. It looks like a popular hangout for the people who work for a living. You see many of the people who hold administrative jobs within the city entering and leaving the bar. Rosecrest Street continues to the east towards Oceanview Drive and west towards the City Wall.
